SWANS.Definition: large, usually white birds with a long neck

HANDLE.Definition: to touch or hold in your hands

FINE.Definition: money that is paid as punishment

EXERCISING.Definition: using a power that you have

REIGNING.Definition: on the throne at that time

DEFACE.Definition: to damage something by drawing on it

TEAR IT UP.Definition: to damage something by pulling it into pieces

RIP IT UP.Definition: to pull something into small pieces

FINED.Definition: made to pay money as a punishment

PREMISES.Definition: building, especially one owned by an organisation

ENFORCED.Definition: if a law is enforced, the police make sure that people obey it

DNA.Definition: if something is "in someone's DNA", it means that they are destined to do something

OBEY.Definition: do what you are told to do

QUEUE-JUMPERS.Definition: people who go to the front of the queue

RUMOUR.Definition: something that may be true, but you don't know

TREASON.Definition: the crime of acting against the best interests of your country

PRIORITY.Definition: something that is important and needs to be dealt with quickly

DRONE.Definition: a small aircraft without a pilot, operated by a radio

LONGBOW.Definition: a large bow, used for hunting or in battles
